USB::S_usb_language_id

USB::S_usb_language_id Struct Reference

The S_usb_language_id structure represents the string descriptor zero, used to specify the languages supported by the device. This structure only define one language ID. More...

#include <usbFramework.hpp>

ushort wLANGID
 LANGID code zero.

Detailed Description

The S_usb_language_id structure represents the string descriptor zero, used to specify the languages supported by the device. This structure only define one language ID.

See also:
USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.6.7 - Table 9.15
